00020 namespace BulletHell.Game.Object
00021 {
00022     public class EnemyPlaneObj : PlaneObj
00023     {
00024         internal Behavior currentBehavior = null;
00025         internal List<Behavior> Behaviors { get; private set; }
00026         internal Path Path { get; private set; }
00027 
00028         public EnemyPlaneObj(Texture2D sprite, int x, int y, int vx, int vy, int srcRectWidth, int srcRectHeight, double moveRate, int hp, Path enemyPath)
00029             : base(sprite, x, y, vx, vy, srcRectWidth, srcRectHeight, moveRate, hp)
00030         {
00031             Behaviors = new List<Behavior>();
00032             Path = enemyPath;
00033         }
00034 
00035         /* Doesn't look like it, but this is a Copy Constructor */
00036         public EnemyPlaneObj(EnemyPlaneObj rhs)
00037             : this(rhs.sprite, (int)rhs.position.X, (int)rhs.position.Y, (int)rhs.velocity.X, (int)rhs.velocity.Y, 
00038             rhs.srcRect.Width, rhs.srcRect.Height, rhs.MoveRate, rhs.hp, 
00039             (rhs.Path != null) ? rhs.Path.createMirror(false, false) : null)
00040         {
00041             foreach(Behavior behavior in rhs.Behaviors)
00042                 Behaviors.Add(behavior.clone(this));
00043 
00044             currentBehavior = rhs.currentBehavior.clone(this);
00045 
00046             foreach(BulletObj bulletObj in rhs.BulletType)
00047                 BulletType.Add(bulletObj);
00048         }
00049 
00050         internal override void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00051         {
00052             if (collision(map.hero) && map.hero.visibility)
00053             {
00054                 map.hero.hp -= 5;
00055                 hp -= 5;
00056             }
00057 
00058             /* If the object is out of visible or allowed viewport, it is removed */
00059             if ((position.Y > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height + 200 || position.Y < _GLOBAL.Viewport.Y - 200
00060                 || position.X > _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width + 200 || position.X < _GLOBAL.Viewport.X - 200))
00061                 visibility = false;
00062 
00063             currentBehavior.Update(map, gameTime);
00064 
00065             base.Update(map, gameTime);
00066         }
00067 
00068         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00069         {
00070             base.Draw(gameTime);
00071         }
00072 
00073         /* Adds an enemy bullet object to the pool given the args */
00074         public override void addBulletPool(int index, float x, float y, double xDirection, double yDirection)
00075         {
00076             EnemyBulletObj bullet = new EnemyBulletObj(BulletType[index].sprite, x, y,
00077                 -BulletType[index].velocity.X, -BulletType[index].velocity.Y, BulletType[index].hitEffect,
00078                 BulletType[index].killable, BulletType[index].bounceable, (float)xDirection, (float)yDirection);
00079 
00080             BulletPool.Add(bullet);
00081         }
00082     }
